dt: {bc}to exhaust or greatly decrease the physical strength of {bc}{sx|fatigue||}

pt: {sc}tire{/sc} {sc}weary{/sc} {sc}fatigue{/sc} {sc}exhaust{/sc} {sc}jade{/sc} mean to make or become unable or unwilling to continue. {sc}tire{/sc} implies a draining of one's strength or patience.
{sc}weary{/sc} stresses tiring until one is unable to endure more of the same thing.
{sc}fatigue{/sc} suggests great lassitude from excessive strain or undue effort.
{sc}exhaust{/sc} implies complete draining of strength by hard exertion.
{sc}jade{/sc} suggests the loss of all freshness and eagerness.

et: Middle English {it}tyren{/it}, from Old English {it}tēorian, tȳrian{/it}
shortdef: to exhaust or greatly decrease the physical strength of : fatigue
to wear out the patience of : bore

dt: {bc}a rubber cushion that fits around a wheel (as of an automobile) and usually contains compressed air
{bc}a metal hoop forming the tread of a wheel

shortdef: a rubber cushion that fits around a wheel (as of an automobile) and usually contains compressed air
a metal hoop forming the tread of a wheel
a woman's headband or hair ornament
to adorn (the hair) with an ornament

dt: {bc}a flexible low-pressure pneumatic tire with a large cross section designed to provide cushioning

shortdef: a flexible low-pressure pneumatic tire with a large cross section designed to provide cushioning

dt: {bc}a pneumatic tire with a belt (as of steel or fiberglass) to help prevent punctures that is under the tread and on top of the plies of cords which form the tire's carcass and which are set diagonally to the center line of the tread

shortdef: a pneumatic tire with a belt (as of steel or fiberglass) to help prevent punctures that is under the tread and on top of the plies of cords which form the tire's carcass and which are set diagonally to the center line of the tread

dt: {bc}a pneumatic tire having crossed plies of cords set diagonally to the center line of the tread

shortdef: a pneumatic tire having crossed plies of cords set diagonally to the center line of the tread

dt: {bc}an automotive tire with a tread designed to give added traction on snow

shortdef: an automotive tire with a tread designed to give added traction on snow

dt: {bc}to become bored by (something) {bc}to stop being interested in (something)

dt.t: He soon {it}tired of{/it} doing the same work every day.
She never {it}tires of{/it} listening to music.

shortdef: to become bored by (something) : to stop being interested in (something)
